title: Sounds bug for Poppy

embed.description: Uploaded by Skins LoL France on 2015-12-09.

body: While selecting Poppy in champion select, her old voice is played instead of the new one. This bug occurs only on the English client, works well on the French one but don't know for the others

replies.body:
Hiya! 

This is a known issue and we'll be fixing it!
"en_US," language correctly uses her new voice at champion select
Seems the problem is located only in EN_GB then
